domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @AdamParkhomenko Is it evil of me to wish these people end up with the most heinous symptoms of Covid-19 that’s possible?  I want these morons while laying there trying to gasp for oxygen to reflect on HOW FUCKING STUPID THEY WERE to think their “rights” were more important than their health.
